sub_title: EA at Ascend (USA) | Stress Management & Inner Wellness Coach | Author | International Speaker | World Record Holder |
summary:
Organized, go-getter, quick learner, and results-oriented professional with good experience in schedule
coordination and communications. Seeks Executive Assistant position to
benefit the organization through executive support. Served as a liaison to the
Executive stakeholders which include monitoring and responding to emails,
scheduling, and calendaring meetings; organizing and coordinating executive
outreach and external relations efforts


Currently working as Stress Management & Inner Wellness Coach & an Author!

+ Speaker on topics related to Stress Management and Inner Wellness.

+ Excellent communication skills both Verbal as well as Written.

+ Excellent presentation and leadership skills.

+ Ambitious, go-getter, and quick learner with a lifelong learning attitude.

+ Transformed more than 1000 lives (both online and offline) by helping them achieve control over their thoughts and emotions.

A C H I E V E M E N TS

+ 2 World Records Holder – in OMG book of World Records.
Collecting Videos of 1534 people reciting Hnuman Chalisa.
7777 Ram naam written on PanchMuskhi Hanuman ji Maharaj.

+ Author of 12 Magical Life Lessons from Hanuman Chalisa (Children book).

+ Most Inspirational Woman Award in Stress Management and Inner Wellness by Global Eminence Awards 2022.

+ Co-Author of World Record Holder Anthology ‘Azadi ka Amrit Mahostsav’ 
(Growth, Achievements, Pride saga of India-1947-2022).

+ Qualified Graduate Aptitude Test in Engineering in Life Sciences GATE (XL) 
2021. – GATE Score 400.

+ Brand Ambassador at Bhabad International Publication.

+ Registered speaker at RKDx Talks.

+ Speaker at Igniting Dreams of Young Minds Foundation(IDYM Group).

+ Member of Prithvi Abhyudaya Association India (PAAI Id No.1981).

+ More than 15 years of experience in the field of Education.

+ Bestseller Author “Take Charge of your Life”, May 2020.

+ Secured 7th position in Devi Ahilya Vishwa Vidhyalaya during MSc. 
Biotech, 2021.

+ Secured 11th position in DAVV during BSc. Biotech, 2006.

school.name: Prestige Institute of Management and Research,Indore.
Soft Vision Institute of Technology & Science.

profile_positions.description:
Manage the Business of the Chief Executive Officer and Assigned Executives

•	Initiate communications, prioritize correspondence, calls, clients and vendors, communicate with internal and external parties, draft letters and documents, research and gather information and assist the CEO in optimizing his/her time and schedule.  
•	Communicate with the direct reports of the CEO, resolving issues and acting as a liaison.
•	Maintain the CEO’s appointment schedule by planning and scheduling meetings, conferences, and teleconferences.
•	Assist CEO with his/her role(s) in professional organizations and with speaking engagements and other related activities.
•	Manage all confidential documents, records, and other proprietary and confidential information on behalf of the CEO; maintain the highest level of confidentiality at all times.
•	Manage all aspects of the CEO’s office operations including Social Media presence.
•	Coordinate and prepare travel itinerary for the CEO, and other members of the Executive team.
•	Prepare, edit, and coordinate presentations for the CEO and other Executive team.
Manage the Board of Directors
•	Prepare, edit, and coordinate presentations for Board of Directors meetings.
•	Organize and coordinate meetings for the Board of Directors and associated Committees.
•	Function as liaison to the Board of Directors on behalf of the Company; communicate with directors and resolve concerns.

Manage and Coordinate Special Projects

•	Manage and coordinate Company-wide regular and special meetings and events, such as weekly stand-up meetings, quarterly Town Hall meetings, etc.  
•	Coordinate and track expenses and prepare weekly, monthly, or quarterly reports
•	Prepare reports and materials on a variety of subjects for various purposes including Company meetings.
•	Partner with various departments to co-manage special projects, such as training events.
•	Produce quality and timely work, collaborating across all Company departments and functions.
profile_positions.title: EA at Ascend

profile_positions.description:
•	Assisted the director of institute in optimizing his time and schedule by gathering relevant information. Scheduled communications with relevant stakeholders and drafted the required documents for the meeting. 
•	Handled executive communication, including taking calls and responding to 50+ weekly emails.
•	Planned, coordinated, and ensured an organized schedule for the director, serving as gatekeeper to manage his time.
•	Researched, prioritized, and followed up on 100% of incoming issues and concerns addressed to the Executive and determined the appropriate course of action.
•	Coordinated 5 complex weekly meetings such as the quarterly update meetings, staff retreats, and institute level meetings for the all staff.
•	Responsible for preparing, updating and coordination of the presentations for the Director.
•	Organized, updated, and digitized 500+ documents.
•	Conducted various Faculty Development Programs focusing soft skill development, right teaching methodology, using technology for better lecture delivery etc.
•	Conducted Student development Program on various topics like improving communication, time management, goal setting, stress management for better performance etc.
•	Prepare and deliver Webinars to students for corporate readiness via discussion groups and personal Interviews; Soft skills development of students such as Business Etiquettes, Corporate communication, Presentation skills etc.
•	Ensure that students in the Business School receive a premium experience by delivering high quality education and leadership.
•	Participating in staff development program and in-service training courses within and outwit the Institute.
•	Mentor students on course and academic matters and career decisions
•	Work on enhancing English language skills of students to aid career development needs.
•	Keep all staff informed about change in curriculum, policies and newsletters issued by the Institute.
profile_positions.title: Administrative Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Content Writer Role
•	Researching industry-related topics (combining online sources, interviews and studies).
•	Writing clear marketing copy to promote our products/services
•	Proofread and edit blog posts before publication
•	Submit work to editors for input and approval

•	Coordinate with marketing and design teams to illustrate articles

•	Conduct simple keyword research and use SEO guidelines to increase web traffic

•	Promote content on social media

•	Identify customers’ needs and gaps in our content and recommend new topics

•	Ensure all-around consistency (style, fonts, images and tone)

•	Update website content as needed

Role apart from the role of a content writer: 
•	Scheduling and organizing meetings, both internal as well as with clients. 
•	Documenting the minutes of meeting with accuracy.
•	Prompt communication in spite of working in different time zones.
•	Help the new joiners with induction program of the company and supported them in getting acquainted with the company culture and policies.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Specialist (Content Writer)

profile_positions.description:
Worked as an Assistant Professor (Finance) in MBA Department,at Venkateshwar Institute of Technology, Indore.
Subjects : Financial Management, Security Analysis and Portfolio Management, Financial Derivative, Fundamentals of Management.
Guided students in their Major Project works.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Professor
